title: Z-O-M-B-I-E-S
plot: Students from Zombietown are transferred to a high school in a suburban town preoccupied with uniformity, traditions and pep rallies.
writer: David Light, Joseph Raso, David Light (based on 'Zombies & Cheerleaders' written by), Joseph Raso (based on 'Zombies & Cheerleaders' written by)
actors: Milo Manheim, Meg Donnelly, Trevor Tordjman, Kylee Russell

title: Zapped
plot: When Zoey's mom remarries, Zoey finds it hard adjusting to her new life - no longer the only kid in the family.
writer: Leslie Margolis (based on the novel "Boys Are Dogs" by), Billy Eddy (teleplay), Matt Eddy (teleplay), Rachelle Skoretz (television story by)
actors: Zendaya, Chanelle Peloso, Spencer Boldman, Emilia McCarthy
